description.zh-cn: 香港女歌手、演员、音乐制作人、主持人及作家。1990年代红遍亚洲地区，有“玉女掌门人”美誉。
description.en: Hong Kong singer, actress, music producer, host, and writer. She became widely popular across Asia in the 1990s and is known as the 'Jade Girl Master'.

description.zh-cn: 香港作家，倪匡之子，周慧敏的丈夫。
description.en: Hong Kong writer, son of Ni Kuang, and husband of Vivian Chow.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名作家，倪震的父亲。
description.en: Renowned Hong Kong writer, father of Joe Nieh.

description.zh-cn: 香港Raidas组合主音，周慧敏的初恋男友。
description.en: Lead singer of the Hong Kong band Raidas and Vivian Chow's first boyfriend in the entertainment industry.

description.zh-cn: 香港乐队组合。
description.en: A Hong Kong band.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌手及演员，周慧敏的好友，并曾担任其演唱会创作总监。
description.en: Hong Kong singer and actor, a close friend of Vivian Chow, and served as the creative director for her concert.

description.zh-cn: 古巨基的妻子，自2013年起担任周慧敏的经纪人。
description.en: Wife of Leo Ku, has been Vivian Chow's manager since 2013.

description.zh-cn: 香港传媒人，在周慧敏出道早期发掘并提携她。
description.en: Hong Kong media personality who discovered and promoted Vivian Chow in her early career.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌手，曾与周慧敏在香港电台共同主持节目并多次合作演唱歌曲。
description.en: Hong Kong singer who co-hosted a radio program with Vivian Chow at RTHK and collaborated on several songs.

description.zh-cn: 香港的公共广播机构。
description.en: The public broadcasting service in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港的免费无线电视台。
description.en: A free-to-air television broadcaster in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 周慧敏与倪震于2009年1月5日在香港注册结婚。
description.en: Vivian Chow and Joe Nieh registered their marriage in Hong Kong on January 5, 2009.

description.zh-cn: 倪震与周慧敏于2009年1月5日在香港注册结婚。
description.en: Joe Nieh and Vivian Chow registered their marriage in Hong Kong on January 5, 2009.

description.zh-cn: 周慧敏与倪震在1989年因共同主持节目相识成为恋人，1992年分手，1996年复合，直至2009年结婚。
description.en: Vivian Chow and Joe Nieh became a couple in 1989 after co-hosting a show, broke up in 1992, got back together in 1996, and married in 2009.

description.zh-cn: 倪震与周慧敏在1989年因共同主持节目相识成为恋人，1992年分手，1996年复合，直至2009年结婚。
description.en: Joe Nieh and Vivian Chow became a couple in 1989 after co-hosting a show, broke up in 1992, got back together in 1996, and married in 2009.

description.zh-cn: 倪震是作家倪匡的儿子。
description.en: Joe Nieh is the son of writer Ni Kuang.

description.zh-cn: 周慧敏出道时曾与Raidas组合主音陈德彰拍拖。
description.en: When Vivian Chow debuted, she was in a relationship with Chan Tak Cheung, the lead singer of the band Raidas.

description.zh-cn: 陈德彰曾与周慧敏拍拖。
description.en: Chan Tak Cheung was once in a relationship with Vivian Chow.

description.zh-cn: 周慧敏与古巨基是好友。古巨基曾邀请周慧敏合唱歌曲《爱得太迟》并出演MV，并担任周慧敏30周年演唱会的创作总监。周慧敏的经纪人陈韵晴是古巨基的妻子。
description.en: Vivian Chow and Leo Ku are close friends. Leo Ku invited Chow to feature in his song 'Love Comes Too Late' and its MV, and he served as the creative director for her 30th-anniversary concert. Chow's manager, Lorraine Chan, is Leo Ku's wife.

description.zh-cn: 古巨基与周慧敏是好友。古巨基曾邀请周慧敏合唱歌曲《爱得太迟》并出演MV，并担任周慧敏30周年演唱会的创作总监。古巨基的妻子陈韵晴是周慧敏的经纪人。
description.en: Leo Ku and Vivian Chow are close friends. He invited Chow to feature in his song 'Love Comes Too Late' and its MV, and served as the creative director for her 30th-anniversary concert. His wife, Lorraine Chan, is Chow's manager.

description.zh-cn: 陈韵晴是古巨基的妻子。
description.en: Lorraine Chan is the wife of Leo Ku.

description.zh-cn: 自2013年起，陈韵晴接任周慧敏的经纪人一职。
description.en: Since 2013, Lorraine Chan has served as Vivian Chow's manager.

description.zh-cn: 俞琤在周慧敏参加新秀歌唱大赛后赏识并邀请她参与电影演出，开启了其演艺生涯，后续也为其演唱会命名提供帮助。
description.en: Yuri Chan appreciated Vivian Chow after she participated in the New Talent Singing Awards and invited her to act in films, launching her entertainment career. She later also helped name her concert.

description.zh-cn: 周慧敏在1987年加入香港电台担任唱片骑师，1991年为专注乐坛事业而放弃该职务。
description.en: Vivian Chow joined RTHK as a Disc Jockey in 1987 and left the position in 1991 to focus on her music career.

description.zh-cn: 周慧敏在香港电台期间曾与黄凯芹合作主持节目《二人世界》，并多次合唱歌曲，如《情未了》。周慧敏曾出席黄凯芹的演唱会并合唱，黄凯芹也曾担任周慧敏演唱会的嘉宾。
description.en: During her time at RTHK, Vivian Chow co-hosted the program 'A World for Two' with Christopher Wong and collaborated on several songs, such as 'Love Ends Not'. Chow has attended Wong's concerts as a guest performer, and he has also been a guest at her concerts.

description.zh-cn: 1986年，在电台监制邓蔼霖的鼓励下，周慧敏参加了业余唱片骑师大赛并获奖，从而进入广播界。
description.en: In 1986, with the encouragement of radio producer Alice Tang, Vivian Chow participated in the Amateur DJ Contest and won an award, which led to her career in broadcasting.

description.zh-cn: 1986年，在电台监制倪秉郎的鼓励下，周慧敏参加了业余唱片骑师大赛并获奖，从而进入广播界。
description.en: In 1986, with the encouragement of radio producer Ngai Ping-long, Vivian Chow participated in the Amateur DJ Contest and won an award, which led to her career in broadcasting.

description.zh-cn: 1991年，周慧敏听从郑丹瑞的建议，放弃唱片骑师的职务，专注于乐坛事业。
description.en: In 1991, Vivian Chow followed Lawrence Cheng's advice to give up her job as a disc jockey and focus on her music career.

description.zh-cn: 1992年，张国荣为周慧敏的歌曲《如果你知我苦衷》作曲，该曲成为其热播代表作之一。
description.en: In 1992, Leslie Cheung composed the song 'If You Knew My Desperation' for Vivian Chow, which became one of her signature hits.

description.zh-cn: 周慧敏与李克勤是香港电台唱片骑师训练班的同期同学，之后有过多次音乐合作，包括合唱歌曲《万千宠爱在一身》及作为演唱会嘉宾。
description.en: Vivian Chow and Hacken Lee were classmates in the RTHK DJ training class and subsequently collaborated on music multiple times, including the duet 'All the Love in One' and appearing as concert guests for each other.
